basic_info.name: Facts & Figures of KCL Institute of Laws-
Why to Join KCL Institute of Laws-?
description: Highly Qualified Faculty – The College has notable faculty with good educational background, having Masters’ degrees, each and every faculty member is one of the best in their respective fields.
World Class Facilities in Library – Reference and Award winning authors’ books collection with subscription to various National & International Law journals..
Focus on Overall Development – The College is focused on moulding the students to become better lawyers by helping them through overall development.
Scholarships- With cutting edge methodologies, the college helps its students gain yearly scholarships from the Nishkam Sikh Welfare Society in New Delhi.
Student Welfare Centre – The College provides services like a Welfare Centre and Medical Facilities to its students.

Section.name: About KKC College of Law
Section.description:
KCL Institute of Laws is an initiative of the KCL Education Charitable Trust which is a non profit organization. Since its inception in the year 2005, it has been imparting legal education to the students of the state and country. As Law is an important pillar of this society and its knowledge is a must, the college is striving towards structuring a strong social environment by imbibing productive and corrective traits in its students and channelizing their energies and sharpening their intellect. With a renowned faculty and the latest methodologies to implement in its course structure, the college has become a hub and a preferred destination for many budding lawyers.
Established In
2009
University Type
Private/ Self Financing
Affiliated With
Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar
Approval
Bar Council of India
Campus Strength
500+
Total Faculty Members
50
Highly Qualified Faculty – The College has notable faculty with good educational background, having Masters’ degrees, each and every faculty member is one of the best in their respective fields.
World Class Facilities in Library – Reference and Award winning authors’ books collection with subscription to various National & International Law journals..
Focus on Overall Development – The College is focused on moulding the students to become better lawyers by helping them through overall development.
Scholarships- With cutting edge methodologies, the college helps its students gain yearly scholarships from the Nishkam Sikh Welfare Society in New Delhi.
Student Welfare Centre – The College provides services like a Welfare Centre and Medical Facilities to its students.
